name: scribecat
description: ScribeCat scribes and is cat - Desktop app for audio transcription and note-taking

scripts.dev: tsc && cp -r src/shared dist/ && cp -r src/renderer/*.html src/renderer/*.css dist/renderer/ 2>/dev/null || true && electron . --dev --no-sandbox
scripts.build: tsc && cp -r src/shared dist/ && cp -r src/renderer/*.html src/renderer/*.css dist/renderer/ 2>/dev/null || true && electron-builder
scripts.build:win: tsc && cp -r src/shared dist/ && cp -r src/renderer/*.html src/renderer/*.css dist/renderer/ 2>/dev/null || true && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:mac: tsc && cp -r src/shared dist/ && cp -r src/renderer/*.html src/renderer/*.css dist/renderer/ 2>/dev/null || true && electron-builder --mac
scripts.dist: tsc && cp -r src/shared dist/ && cp -r src/renderer/*.html src/renderer/*.css dist/renderer/ 2>/dev/null || true && electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.pack: tsc && cp -r src/shared dist/ && cp -r src/renderer/*.html src/renderer/*.css dist/renderer/ 2>/dev/null || true && electron-builder --dir
scripts.test: node test/smoke-test.js && node test/renderer-functions.test.js && node test/error-monitoring.test.js && node test/e2e-boot.test.js

author: ScribeCat Team
